release.note: Public Release
`Editor Macros addin <http://www.clarionedge.com/clarion/addins/editor-macros-addin.html>`_
Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc
This project still has some dependencies on the Krypton Toolkit which I will sort out soon
Removed the Krypton dependency
Added icons to buttons and menu item
Fixed the problem with Control, Alt and Shift keys!
Added Control+= as the Menu/Pad shortcut key
The Stop button has been removed and functionality merged with the start button.
You can now right-click on the key events in the list and remove individual items.
Stop repeated KeyDown events being recorded for Control, Alt and Shift keys which breaks playback of macro. `Bug #8 <http://support.fushnisoft.net/thebuggenie/clarionaddins/issues/8>`_
Added save/restore of last recorded macro
Added :menuselection:`Edit --> Playback Current Macro` menu item with :kbd:`Alt-=` as the shortcut
Debug window now shows up/down arrow characters for a cleaner display
Improved playback stability and fixed some problems with multiple playback when using the keyboard
Code completion is now turned off during plaback. This gives a significant improvment in playback speed and reliability!
Option to automatically disable Code Completion while recording a new macro.
Now has ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
Removed ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
Initial Release
`Bringing back Remove Line to C7 <http://www.clarionedge.com/clarion/addins/bringing-back-remove-line-to-c7.html>`_
Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc
No longer messes up the editor if you try and delete the last line of an embed when in source view
Now supports undo
Now supports all text editor controls (clw, inc, tpw, tpl, etc) not just the clarion Embeditor/Embed editor
Menu item moved into the Edit menu. Seems to make more sense here
Menu item is only active when a text editor is open
Added a new Autostart command to do an AssemblyResolve when the correct assembly version for CommonSources.dll is not found. This means the same addin will for for C7 and C8!
ResolveEventHandler was causing an exception in C8 when loading the window designer. The ResolveEventHandler now also resolves CommonControl and ClarionNetWindow
Another assembly resolver.
Assembly resolver now uses Directory.GetPath to search the BackendBindings folder for the correct assembly instead of using hard coded values!
Another assembly resolving fix. Now the resolver performs a search from the BaseDirectory instead of just the ClarionBinding directory.
Assembly resolve code moved to a separate assembly
Now has ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
Removed ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
First combined release
Renamed from EditorMacros to EditorExtras
Added RemoveLine feature.
Added CodeSnippets feature.
Added support for PROMPT_VALUE code snippet tag. Use this after a PROMPT tag to insert the value entered in the prompt.
Snippet PROMPT dialog text changed.
Cancelling from the snippet PROMPT now returns a String.Empty instead of null.
